mapper.select: SELECT a.st AS label, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM tb_emp_acct a WHERE a.vend_id = #{vendId} GROUP BY a.st ORDER BY cnt DESC

SELECT r.role_ty AS label, COUNT(DISTINCT ur.emp_acct_id) AS cnt FROM tb_user_role ur JOIN tb_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id AND r.vend_id = ur.vend_id WHERE ur.vend_id = #{vendId} GROUP BY r.role_ty ORDER BY cnt DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT l.emp_acct_id AS empAcctId, COUNT(*) AS failCnt, MAX(l.err_dttm) AS lastFailDttm FROM tb_log l WHERE l.vend_id = #{vendId} AND l.motion_ty = 'lg2' GROUP BY l.emp_acct_id ORDER BY failCnt DESC, lastFailDttm DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT l.err_dttm AS errDttm, l.emp_acct_id AS empAcctId, l.vend_id AS vendId, l.motion_ty AS motionTy, l.smry AS smry, l.crea_by AS creaBy FROM tb_log l WHERE l.vend_id = #{vendId} AND l.motion_ty IN ('ro1', 'au1') ORDER BY l.err_dttm DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 20
